src:
Preston lifts Ohio over St. Bonaventure 65-53
06 Nov 2019, 04:18 by EndPlay
ST. BONAVENTURE, N.Y. (AP) - Jason Preston recorded 11 points and 13 assists to carry Ohio to a 65-53 win over Saint Bonaventure on Tuesday night.
Jordan Dartis had 19 points for Ohio. Ben Vander Plas added 12 points. Sylvester Ogbonda had seven rebounds for the visitors.
Alejandro Vasquez had 12 points for the Bonnies. Amadi Ikpeze added 10 points. Bobby Planutis had 10 rebounds.
Ohio plays Heidelberg at home on Saturday. Saint Bonaventure plays Vermont at home on Friday.
___
